attribute_definition: A numeric id for the macrofossil type (starting with 1).
A string representing the macrofossil type. This can be a custom value, such as 'vegetation', 'ash', 'charcoal', 'unidentifiable organic matter'.
A numeric value representing the lower size bound for the macrofossil type (e.g. if only macrocharcoal particles larger than 1mm were considered) [mm].
A numeric value representing the upper size bound for the macrofossil type (e.g. if wood fragments were classified by size) [mm].
The same as attribute 'taxon_organ', but for macrofossils.
